mapper.insert: insert into orders ( receive_name, receive_phone, order_addr1, order_addr2, order_addr3, order_memo, order_price, order_date ) values ( #{receive_name}, #{receive_phone}, #{order_addr1}, #{order_addr2}, #{order_addr3}, #{order_memo}, #{order_price}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, product_id, user_id, order_quantity, order_price, order_date FROM orders
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET receive_name = #{receive_name}, receive_phone = #{receive_phone}, order_addr1 = #{order_addr1}, order_addr2 = #{order_addr2}, order_addr3 = #{order_addr3}, order_memo = #{order_memo} WHERE order_id = #{order_id}
